07-03.title: EXPERIENCE: THE BEST TEACHER
07-03.quote: Being still inexperienced and having just made conscious contact with God, it is not probable that we are going to be inspired at all times.
content: Some say that experience is the best teacher, but I believe that experience is the only teacher. I have been able to learn of God's love for me only by the experience of my dependence on that love. At first I could not be sure of His direction in my life, but now I see that if I am to be bold enough to ask for His guidance, I must act as if He has provided it. I frequently ask God to help me remember that He has a path for me.
